titles.title: National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
To reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Ms. Waters moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2578.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 93.

bill.summary:
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
This bill reauthorizes the National Flood Insurance Program through September 30, 2019.
The bill shall take effect as if it had been enacted on May 31, 2019.
